body: Yeah that is theoretically allowed, but we never do (nor did) that. `grad_input_nr` would be more precise, but let's limit the number of codemods we'll be running. This one makes sense, because the API will be more convenient and it will be used in external modules, but in general you probably won't be using `output_nr()` outside of autograd.

This one makes sense, because the API will be more convenient and it will be used in external modules, but in general you probably won't be using output_nr() outside of autograd.
